#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
char A[]="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
char B[]="zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
char C[150];
int main()
{
	int p=0,k=0,t=0,i=0,f;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		f=0,i=0;	
		scanf("%d",&k);	
		p=k%25;
		while(p)
		{
			C[i++]=A[p--];
			k--;f=1;
		}
		if(f)
		strcat(C,"a");
		p=k/25;
		while(p--)
		{
			strcat(C,B);
		}
		puts(C);
		memset(C,0,150);
	}
return 0;
}
